channel.title: Knight of the force part II is coming out
channel.description:
I'm not quite sure if there is anybody waiting for it or even know about it, so I will introduce a little about KOTF.
[b]Knight of the force (KOTF)[/b] is a mod of [i]Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy[/i], an fps-tps shooter action game released in 2003
This mod was released the [u]first[/u] part in 2008 and the second part's release date was postponed to the indefinite time.(like Blackmesa)
But hey, last week, Tim had posted something exciting about the mod [url='https://kotf.com/main.htm']on his site![/url]
Time to join the full mod!!!!! :smiley: :'( :smiley: :'(

item.title: Knight of the force part II is coming out
item.dc:creator: Kaweebo
item.description:
I’ll probably play it whenever I get Jedi Academy, Outcast is my primary objective for PC Star Wars games atm.

Read full topic
item.source: Knight of the force part II is coming out

item.title: Knight of the force part II is coming out
item.dc:creator: Frozen_Cham
item.description:
Vitriol:

I have never heard of it before, but I sure am interested.

Is it worth downloading KotF now, or just waiting a month (or more) for the english version of KotFII to be released?

Im thinking mostly about single player BTW.

yeah, if I were you, I’ll be patient until the releasing of full mod. The single player is great, especially in real-life saber mode, you can cut off their limbs, that’s funny.

Read full topic
item.source: Knight of the force part II is coming out

item.title: Knight of the force part II is coming out
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
I really didn’t care for Academy that much. I would much rather have seen a total conversion of Jedi Knight or Jedi Outcast. It seems there were some planned but I think they sorta fizzled out. Ah well, guess it’s good news for Academy fans.

Read full topic

item.description:
I’m not quite sure if there is anybody waiting for it or even know about it, so I will introduce a little about KOTF.

Knight of the force (KOTF) is a mod of Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy, an fps-tps shooter action game released in 2003

This mod was released the first part in 2008 and the second part’s release date was postponed to the indefinite time.(like Blackmesa)

But hey, last week, Tim had posted something exciting about the mod on his site!

Time to join the full mod!!! :’( :’(
